main.title: Start Your Business Setup in Dubai with Confidence
main.subtitle: Prime Setup offers clear, step-by-step support for business setup in Dubai. From company registration to licensing and ongoing assistance, we guide you through each stage.

blog.title: Useful articles and tips
blog.subtitle: We share useful information based on real experience working with entrepreneurs. Learn about the intricacies of company registration, taxes, visas and much more.

services.title: All services for starting and developing a business in the UAE - in one place
services.subtitle: We offer comprehensive business support in the UAE — from the idea to full launch and development. Our team helps entrepreneurs at every stage, ensuring legal purity, transparency and maximum efficiency of processes.

contacts.title: We are ready to help you start a business in the UAE - just write to us.
contacts.subtitle: We are always in touch and happy to answer any questions.

WhyPrimeSetup.title: Why Choose Prime Setup for Business Setup in Dubai
WhyPrimeSetup.subtitle: Setting up a business in Dubai is a major step-Prime Setup makes it simple, secure, and efficient. With over 15 years of experience, we have helped hundreds of entrepreneurs and companies establish themselves in the UAE, guiding them through every legal and administrative detail so they can focus on growth.

items.title: 15 Years of Experience
items.description: Since 2009, we’ve been helping companies enter the UAE market.

items.title: Comprehensive Solutions
items.description: All business services in one place—from licensing to bank accounts.

items.title: Personalized Approach
items.description: Solutions tailored to your business specifics and goals.

items.title: Fast Registration
items.description: Start your business in as little as 48 hours.

items.title: Trusted Partners

servicesPage.title: Full range of services for starting and developing a business in the UAE

items.title: Company Registration in UAE
items.content: We help register businesses in any jurisdiction: Mainland, Free Zone or Offshore. We provide consultation, prepare documents and fully support the process until obtaining the registration certificate.

items.title: Bank Account Opening
items.content: We support you at all stages of opening corporate and personal accounts in UAE banks. We help choose the right bank, prepare documents and pass the interview.

items.title: License Acquisition
items.content: We arrange obtaining all types of business licenses: commercial, professional, industrial and freelance. We handle interactions with regulatory authorities and document processing.

items.title: Virtual Offices and Coworking
items.content: We provide legal addresses, help rent virtual offices, coworking spaces and physical spaces for your business that meet the requirements of your chosen license.

items.title: Tax Consulting
items.content: We consult on UAE tax legislation, including VAT system registration, planning and compliance with all obligations to government authorities.

items.title: Accounting Support
items.content: We provide professional accounting services: reporting, financial analysis, document preparation and support during audits. Everything strictly according to legal requirements.

items.title: Visas for Investors and Employees
items.content: We assist in obtaining residence visas for business owners, employees and their family members. We help with Emirates ID, medical certificates and visa renewals.

items.title: Full Business Support
items.content: Comprehensive support at every stage: from idea to scaling. We handle all administrative and organizational matters so you can focus on growing your business.
